thread.title: Meet Miami Dolphin Jarvis Landry, get free health tests at Walmart Health Fair on Saturday
thread.title_full: Meet Miami Dolphin Jarvis Landry, get free health tests at Walmart Health Fair on Saturday - Sun Sentinel

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Meet Miami Dolphin Jarvis Landry, get free health tests at Walmart Health Fair on Saturday
text:
Meet Miami Dolphins wide receiver Jarvis Landry and get free health screenings at the Lauderdale Lakes Walmart on Saturday.
Landry will be at the store from 1 to 2 p.m. Saturday at 3001 State Road 7 to kick off the Walmart's America's Biggest Health Fair, running from noon to 4 p.m. at more than 4,000 locations.
This first-time event will offer free blood pressure and blood glucose tests, vision screenings, product samples as well as flu shots and immunizations , which may be covered by insurance.
Landry will even hold your hand as you're getting a shot, says a release.
For more information, visit Walmart.com/HealthCare .
